verses.name: Acts 16:1
verses.text: Then came he to Derbe and Lystra: and, behold, a certain disciple was there, named Timotheus, the son of a certain woman, which was a Jewess, and believed; but his father was a Greek:

verses.name: Acts 16:2
verses.text: Which was well reported of by the brethren that were at Lystra and Iconium.

verses.name: Acts 16:3
verses.text: Him would Paul have to go forth with him; and took and circumcised him because of the Jews which were in those quarters: for they knew all that his father was a Greek.
